item.description:
Healer Shares

Wednesday, November 21st

7pm - 9pm

Cost: $10 donation

This is an open share for both healers and others who want to receive.   We usually have Reiki in one room and Full Spectrum in the other room.    Give a healing and get one too!

Come on down and practice your techniques - we have a very diverse group of healers and lots of space for tables and clients.

In 2 hours, you may get to experience the modalities above - plus others such as Shamanic, Quantum Touch, The Reconnection & Yuen Method to name a few - depending who shows up.

Don't gauge the number of attendees by the RSVP number, as we often have 15-30 people attending with 0 RSVP's.


That said, RSVPs are appreciated so we can prepare the rooms.

 

Lisa Campion carried on this tradition for more than a decade. As Lisa steps aside to pursue other interests, we will continue to maintain the Solstice Healer Share tradition of fun, friendship and bringing benefit to others.

This is by far the best share in the area. Thank you Lisa.

 

UPCOMING 2012 HEALER SHARE DATES:

Wednesday, December 12th.


For more information email solsticehealing@yahoo.com or Call 508-533-0669

group.name: The Metrowest Reiki and Energy Healers Share

item.name: Healer Share
